Valéry Inkijinoff https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Val%C3%A9ry_Inkijinoff 0 Valéry Inkijinoff (Russian: Валерьян (Валерий) Иванович Инкижинов; 25 March 1895 – 26 September 1973) was a French actor of Russian-Buryat origin. His strong facial features made him a favourite villain of French cinema for exotic adventure films and crime movies. Valéry_Inkijinoff ( Russian : Валерьян ( Валерий ) Иванович_Инкижинов ; 25_March_1895 – 26_September_1973 ) was a_French_actor of Russian-Buryat_origin . His_strong_facial_features made him a_favourite_villain of French_cinema for exotic_adventure_films and crime_movies .
